Quality Education.reason: Course emphasizes teamwork and project-based learning → relevant to Quality Education.

The project lasts for three semesters
Each team is required to demonstrate their projects

The role of systems design and implementation patterns in a business organization

technologies used include Virtual Reality (VR) hardware, Unity

Quality Education.reason: The course provides practical, project-based education in information systems, requiring students to develop a working system and exercise their knowledge in a real-life application.
evidence: The course requires the students to develop a working system for a real-life application on PC and mobile APP.
The student will exercise their knowledge of: Planning the development of an application system.
Implementing an application system with a team of project members.

訂定商業模式 (define business models)

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course is fundamentally about creating innovative information systems and computer applications using modern technologies like VR and mobile apps, which are core to this SDG.
